ygData.subject: Re: Targetted?
ygData.msgSnippet: I certainly hope everyone is reporting this as a bug.  It s never happened to me, but this sounds like it could have very serious implications.  You faction
ygData.messageBody:
I certainly hope everyone is reporting this as a bug. It's never happened
to me, but
this sounds like it could have very serious implications. You faction could
really be
screwed if a named NPC gets killed near you. I urge everyone experiencing
this to
file an in-game bug report.

Ethric

----- Original Message -----
From: Roop Dirump <roop@...>
To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
Sent: Monday, May 31, 1999 7:52 PM
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Targetted?


> From: "Roop Dirump" <roop@...>
>
>
>
> >From: Abraham Hardjana <ahardjan@...>
> >
>
> >BTW has anyone noticed a faction hit message whenever something dies
> >around you?? I was hunting Gnolls in Highhold pass and was constantly
>
>
>
> I have noticed this as well! I was not in a group, and was in fact
brewing
> for about an hour and a half in Freeport. I had not been playing any
songs,
> only leaning over the barrell crafting Fierce Brew, hadn't attacked
anything
> all night, and received the faction change notice several times. People
> tend to attack certain guards and even a spawning tavern NPC, but I took
> absolutely no part in these nearby battles, just making brew and chatting
> with drunks (I offered free beer in an auction, heheh).
>
> Roop
>
>
> ------------------------------------------------------------------------
> What do lizards and rock music have in common?
> http://www.onelist.com
> They both have communities at ONElist. Find yours today!
>
